snippet: Manchester City will not hesitate to dump their passing style and play more direct if it leads to more clean sheets, defender Pablo Zabaleta has said....

headline.main: Man City Ready to Play Direct When Needed, Says Zabaleta
headline.print_headline: Man City Ready to Play Direct When Needed, Says Zabaleta

lead_paragraph: Manchester City will not hesitate to dump their passing style and play more direct if it leads to more clean sheets, defender Pablo Zabaleta has said.

headline.main: Chelsea Stay Top After Comeback Win Over Tottenham
headline.print_headline: Chelsea Stay Top After Comeback Win Over Tottenham

snippet: American investors Jason Levien and Steve Kaplan have completed their takeover of Swansea City, subject to Premier League approval, the Welsh club said on Sunday....

headline.main: U.S. Investors Complete Swansea City Takeover
headline.print_headline: U.S. Investors Complete Swansea City Takeover

lead_paragraph: American investors Jason Levien and Steve Kaplan have completed their takeover of Swansea City, subject to Premier League approval, the Welsh club said on Sunday.

snippet: Premier Paolo Gentiloni easily won a vote of confidence Tuesday night from the Italian Parliament's lower chamber for his new government, overcoming opposition outrage that his cabinet and agenda essentially mirror those of his humiliated predeces...

headline.main: Italy's New Government Wins 1st of 2 Confidence Votes
headline.print_headline: Italy's New Government Wins 1st of 2 Confidence Votes

lead_paragraph: Premier Paolo Gentiloni easily won a vote of confidence Tuesday night from the Italian Parliament's lower chamber for his new government, overcoming opposition outrage that his cabinet and agenda essentially mirror those of his humiliated predecessor.

snippet: The Chelsea players have taken responsibility for their performances under the guidance of manager Antonio Conte, according to former captain Ray Wilkins....

headline.main: Chelsea Players Now Taking Responsibility, Says Wilkins
headline.print_headline: Chelsea Players Now Taking Responsibility, Says Wilkins

lead_paragraph: The Chelsea players have taken responsibility for their performances under the guidance of manager Antonio Conte, according to former captain Ray Wilkins.

snippet: Aston Villa have announced that they will take no further action against forward Gabriel Agbonlahor, who was dropped from the first team on Friday after British media published pictures of him apparently smoking a shisha pipe while on holiday in D...

headline.main: Agbonlahor Will Not Face Villa Action Over Shisha Pictures
headline.print_headline: Agbonlahor Will Not Face Villa Action Over Shisha Pictures

lead_paragraph: Aston Villa have announced that they will take no further action against forward Gabriel Agbonlahor, who was dropped from the first team on Friday after British media published pictures of him apparently smoking a shisha pipe while on holiday in Dubai.

snippet: Manchester United manager Louis van Gaal believes his side has a "big chance" of securing a top four finish to qualify for the Champions League next season after defeating neighbours Manchester City on Sunday....

headline.main: Derby Victory Gives Van Gaal Big Hope of Top-Four Finish
headline.print_headline: Derby Victory Gives Van Gaal Big Hope of Top-Four Finish

lead_paragraph: Manchester United manager Louis van Gaal believes his side has a "big chance" of securing a top four finish to qualify for the Champions League next season after defeating neighbours Manchester City on Sunday.

snippet: Chelsea manager Guus Hiddink has reminded Eden Hazard of his priorities, asking the midfielder to focus on improving his form and fitness rather than contemplating a potential move at the end of the season....

headline.main: Chelsea's Hiddink Wants Hazard to Focus on Form, Not PSG
headline.print_headline: Chelsea's Hiddink Wants Hazard to Focus on Form, Not PSG

lead_paragraph: Chelsea manager Guus Hiddink has reminded Eden Hazard of his priorities, asking the midfielder to focus on improving his form and fitness rather than contemplating a potential move at the end of the season.

snippet: Manchester United must avoid a repeat of last month's performance in order to revive their Premier League campaign after the international break, midfielder Ander Herrera has said....

headline.main: United Must Come Back Stronger After International Break-Herrera
headline.print_headline: United Must Come Back Stronger After International Break-Herrera

lead_paragraph: Manchester United must avoid a repeat of last month's performance in order to revive their Premier League campaign after the international break, midfielder Ander Herrera has said.

snippet: The mood in the Crystal Palace dressing room is a bit "miserable" after losing five successive Premier League games, leading manager Alan Pardew to say even a draw in Saturday's  clash with Swansea City would give his players a lift....

headline.main: A Draw Would Be Good for 'Miserable' Palace, Says Pardew
headline.print_headline: A Draw Would Be Good for 'Miserable' Palace, Says Pardew

lead_paragraph: The mood in the Crystal Palace dressing room is a bit "miserable" after losing five successive Premier League games, leading manager Alan Pardew to say even a draw in Saturday's  clash with Swansea City would give his players a lift.
